title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 13.8 - Compulsory participation prohibited
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 13.8 - Compulsory participation prohibited

State Regulations

No insurer shall sell insurance pursuant to a mass merchandising plan if it is a condition of employment or of membership in an association or organization that any employee or member purchase insurance pursuant to such plan, or if any employee or member shall be subject to any penalty by reason of his nonparticipation. Notes

13.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
